steps.description: Talk to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser and turn in Ledger from Tanaris
Talk to Marin Noggenfogger and accept The Thirsty Goblin
Talk to Gimblethorn. Withdraw Goodsteel Ledger, Solid Crystal Leg Shaft, Overdue Package, Goodsteel's Balanced Flameberge, OOX-17/TN Distress Beacon (If you have it) from your bank
Talk to Gimblethorn. Deposit Black Dragonflight Molt (If you have it) into your bank
Talk to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser and turn in Ledger from Tanaris
Talk to Innkeeper Fizzgrimble. Set your Hearthstone to Gadgetzan
Talk to Tran'rek and accept Thistleshrub Valley
Talk to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser and accept The Scrimshank Redemption
Enter The Gaping Chasm Hive
Loot the Scrimshank's Surveying Gear on the ground

tips.text: The Scrimshank's Surveying Gear is inside of the Hive

steps.description: Use the OOX-17/TN Distress Beacon to start the quest. Accept Find OOX-17/TN

tips.text: Use the OOX-17/TN Distress Beacon to start the quest
Skip this step if you do not have it

steps.description: Talk to the Homing Robot OOX-17/TN and turn in Find OOX-17/TN!

tips.text: Do NOT accept the follow up and attempt to do the Escort, unless you are in a group

steps.description: Talk to the Homing Robot OOX-17/TN and accept Rescue OOX-17/TN!
Escort the Homing Robot OOX-17/TN to safety
Take the mountain path to avoid Elite Dune Smashers
Click the Uldum Pedestal and turn in Seeing What Happens

tips.text: There is ONE Elite Dune Smasher which patrols. Ensure you avoid it. The rest are stationary

steps.description: Click the Uldum Pedestal and accept The Stone Watcher
Talk to the Stone Watcher of Norgannon

tips.text: There is ONE Elite Dune Smasher which patrols. Ensure you avoid it

steps.description: Click the Uldum Pedestal, turn in The Stone Watcher and accept Return to Ironforge
Kill Gnarled Thistleshrubs and Thistleshrub Rootshapers. Kill Thistleshrub Dew Collectors. Loot them for the Laden Dew Gland

tips.text: Prioritize killing Thistleshrub Dew Collectors as the Laden Dew Gland has a low drop chance

steps.description: Kill Thistleshrub Dew Collectors. Loot them for the Laden Dew Gland
Kill Gnarled Thistleshrubs and Thistleshrub Rootshapers
Talk to Tooga. This will start an escort quest

tips.text: This will start an escort quest
If you can't see Tooga anywhere you may skip this step

steps.description: Escort Tooga across Tanaris to Steamwheedle Port

tips.text: Do not run too far ahead of Tooga otherwise the quest may fail!

steps.description: Talk to Torta and turn in Tooga's Quest
Travel to Un'goro Crater
Talk to Torwa Pathfinder and accept The Fare of Lar'korwi
Loot Power Crystals on the ground as you quest through Un'Goro Crater
Loot Un'Goro Soil on the ground as you quest through Un'Goro Crater
Click on the Wrecked Raft and accept It's a Secret to Everybody
Click the Small Pack underwater, turn in It's a Secret to Everybody and accept It's a Secret to Everybody
Loot the Piece of Threshadon Carcass
Travel to Marshal's Refuge. Loot Power Crystals on the ground en-route
Travel to Marshal's Refuge
Talk to Muigin and accept Muigin and Larion
Open the Small Pack

tips.text: Use the Small Pack

steps.description: Talk to Linken, turn in It's a Secret to Everybody and accept It's a Secret to Everybody
Destroy the Faded Photograph. Destroy the Heavy Throwing Daggers. You no longer need these

tips.text: You no longer need these

steps.description: Talk to J.D. Collie, accept Crystals of Power and turn in Crystals of Power
Talk to Gryfe and get the Un'Goro Crater Flight Path
Kill Bloodpetal Lashers, Bloodpetal Threshers and Bloodpetal Flayers. Loot them for their Bloodpetals
Talk to Torwa Pathfinder and turn in The Fare of Lar'korwi
Talk to Torwa Pathfinder and accept The Scent of Lar'korwi
Kill Lar'korwi Mates. Loot them for their Ravasaur Pheromone Glands

tips.text: Walking over Raptor Nests on the ground will trigger a Lar'korwi Mate to spawn

steps.description: Talk to Torwa Pathfinder and turn in The Scent of Lar'korwi
Kill Bloodpetal Lashers, Bloodpetal Threshers and Bloodpetal Flayers. Loot them for their Bloodpetals
Kill Ravasaurs. Loot them for A Mangled Journal. Use A Mangled Journal to start the quest

tips.text: Any mob in Un'Goro Crater may drop it
Use A Mangled Journal to start the quest

steps.description: Grind Raptors until you've found a Maraudon group. Once your group is starting to fill up, Hearth to Gadgetzan to turn in a few quests, then fly to Desolace. You will have to accept a few quests in Desolace before running Maraudon

tips.text: Once your group is starting to fill up, Hearth to Gadgetzan to turn in a few quests, then fly to Desolace. You will have to accept a few quests in Desolace before running Maraudon

steps.description: Hearth to Gadgetzan. Buy food/water if needed

tips.text: Buy food/water if needed

steps.description: Hearth to Gadgetzan. Buy food if needed

tips.text: Buy food if needed

steps.description: Talk to Marin Noggenfogger and turn in The Thirsty Goblin
Talk to Marin Noggenfogger and accept In Good Taste
Talk to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser and turn in The Scrimshank Redemption
Talk to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser and accept Insect Part Analysis
Talk to Alchemist Pestlezugg, turn in Insect Part Analysis and accept Insect Part Analysis
Talk to Sprinkle and turn in In Good Taste
Talk to Sprinkle and accept Sprinkle's Secret Ingredient
Talk to Tran'rek and turn in Thistleshrub Valley
Talk to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser, turn in Insect Part Analysis and accept Rise of the Silithid
Talk to Gimblethorn. Withdraw Gorilla Fangs (If you have any), Fool's Stout Report, Pupellyverbos Port from your bank
Talk to Gimblethorn. Deposit Un'Goro Soil, Linken's Training Sword, Insect Analysis Report into your bank
Talk to Bera Stonehammer and fly to Desolace
Talk to Keeper Marandis and accept Corruption of Earth and Seed
Talk to Innkeeper Lyshaerya. Set your Hearthstone to Desolace
Talk to Talendria and accept Vyletongue Corruption
Talk to Willow and accept Twisted Evils
Talk to the Centaur Pariah and accept The Pariah's Instructions

tips.text: The Centaur Pariah patrols slightly around southern Desolace

steps.description: Travel to Maraudon
Kill all Monsters in Maraudon. Loot them for their Theradric Crystal Carvings

tips.text: This can be completed OUTSIDE and INSIDE of the Instance. Don't attempt to complete this now

steps.description: Kill The Nameless Prophet. Loot it for the Amulet of Spirits

tips.text: This is completed OUTSIDE of the Instance. The Nameless Prophets may be patrolling

steps.description: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Gelk. Kill Gelk. Loot him for the Gem of the Second Khan

tips.text: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Gelk
This is completed OUTSIDE of the Instance

steps.description: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Kolk. Kill Kolk. Loot him for the Gem of the First Khan

tips.text: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Kolk
This is completed OUTSIDE of the Instance

steps.description: Talk to the Centaur Pariah and accept Legends of Maraudon
Use the Coated Cerulean Vial in the Orange pool

tips.text: Use the Coated Cerulean Vial in the Orange pool

steps.description: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Magra. Kill Magra. Loot him for the Gem of the Third Khan

tips.text: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Magra
This is completed OUTSIDE of the Instance

steps.description: Enter the Maraudon Instance through the Orange side
Kill any Monster in Maraudon. Loot them for their Theradric Crystal Carvings
Use the Filled Cerulean Vial on small flowers/plants inside Orange. Kill the Noxxious Scions that are summoned

tips.text: Use the Filled Cerulean Vial on small flowers/plants inside Orange

steps.description: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Veng. Kill Veng. Loot him for the Gem of the Fifth Khan

tips.text: Veng patrols around INSIDE the Maraudon Orange Instance

steps.description: Use the Filled Cerulean Vial on small flowers/plants inside Orange. Kill the Noxxious Scions that are summoned

tips.text: Use the Filled Cerulean Vial on small flowers/plants inside Orange

steps.description: Kill Noxxion. Loot him for the Celebrian Rod. Kill Lord Vyletongue. Loot him for the Celebrian Diamond

tips.text: Noxxion is in the Orange section and Lord Vyletongue in the Purple

steps.description: Use the Amulet of Spirits on the Spirit of Maraudos. Kill Maraudos. Loot him for the Gem of the Fourth Khan

tips.text: Maraudos patrols around INSIDE the Maraudon Purple Instance

steps.description: Channel any of the Gems of the Khans to create the Amulet of Union

tips.text: Channel any of the Gems of the Khans to create the Amulet of Union

steps.description: Kill Celebras the Cursed then talk to Celebras the Redeemed and turn in Legends of Maraudon
Talk to Celebras the Redeemed and accept The Scepter of Celebras
Click the Incantation of Celebras on the ground
Wait out the RP

tips.text: Wait out the RP

steps.description: Talk to Celebras the Redeemed and turn in The Scepter of Celebras
Kill Princess Theradras
Talk to Zaetar's Spirit and accept Seed of Life
Kill any Monster in Maraudon. Loot them for their Theradric Crystal Carvings

tips.text: This can be completed OUTSIDE and INSIDE of the Instance

steps.description: Cast Teleport: Moonglade
Teleport to Moonglade. Talk to Loganaar and train your class spells
Talk to the Keeper Remulos and turn in Seed of Life
Hearth to Nijel's Point
Talk to Keeper Marandis and turn in Corruption of Earth and Seed
Talk to Talendria and turn in Vyletongue Corruption
Talk to Willow and turn in Twisted Evils
Talk to the Centaur Pariah and turn in The Pariah's Instructions

tips.text: The Centaur Pariah patrols slightly around southern Desolace

steps.description: Talk to Baritanas Skyriver and fly to Un'Goro Crater
Talk to Bera Stonehammer and fly to Un'Goro Crater
Talk to Williden Marshal, accept Williden's Journal and turn in Williden's Journal
Talk to Muigin and turn in Muigin and Larion
Talk to Muigin and accept A Visit to Gregan
Talk to Gryfe and fly to Ratchet
Take the Boat to Booty Bay
Talk to Captain Hecklebury Smotts and accept The Captain's Chest
Talk to Fin Fizracket and accept Stranglethorn Fever
Talk to Whiskey Slim and turn in Whiskey Slim's Lost Grog
Talk to Crank Fizzlebub and turn in Report Back to Fizzlebub
Talk to Viznik or Rickle. Deposit Bloodpetal into your bank
Talk to Oglethorpe Obnoticus and turn in Rescue OOX-22/FE!
Talk to Oglethorpe Obnoticus and turn in Rescue OOX-17/TN!
Talk to Oglethorpe Obnoticus and turn in Rescue OOX-09/HL!
Talk to Oglethorpe Obnoticus, accept An OOX of Your Own and turn in An OOX of Your Own
Kill Mok'rash. Loot him for the Monogrammed Sash. Use the Monogrammed Sash to start the quest. Accept The Monogrammed Sash

tips.text: Use the Monogrammed Sash to start the quest
Kite Mok'rash around the giant Goblin Statue if needed
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Kill Gorlash. Loot him for Smotts' Chest
Open the Half-Buried Bottles along the coast. Loot them for a Carefully Folded Note. Use the Carefully Folded Note to start the quest

tips.text: Use the Carefully Folded Note to start the quest

steps.description: Travel to Jaguero Isle
Talk to Princess Poobah and turn in Message in a Bottle

tips.text: Beware of Jaguero Stalkers in Stealth throughout the Island

steps.description: Talk to Princess Poobah and accept Message in a Bottle
Kill King Mukla. Loot him for the Shackle Key
Talk to Princess Poobah and turn in Message in a Bottle
Talk to Witch Doctor Unbagwa. Turn in your 10 Gorilla Fangs to summon Mokk the Savage. Kill Mokk the Savage. Loot him for the Heart of Mokk

tips.text: Turn in your 10 Gorilla Fangs to summon Mokk the Savage
You'll have to deal with 3 waves of attacking Gorillas
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Travel to Booty Bay
Talk to Captain Hecklebury Smotts and Sprogger, turn in The Captain's Chest and The Monogrammed Sash, accept The Captain's Cutlass
Talk to Captain Hecklebury Smotts and turn in The Captain's Chest
Talk to Captain Hecklebury Smotts, turn in The Monogrammed Sash and accept The Captain's Cutlass
Talk to Captain Hecklebury Smotts and Sprogger, accept The Captain's Cutlass and turn in The Captain's Cutlass
Talk to Fin Fizracket and turn in Stranglethorn Fever
Abandon The Captain's Chest
Abandon Stranglethorn Fever
Abandon Message in a Bottle
Talk to Gyll and fly to Stormwind
Teleport to Stormwind City
Talk to Jennea and train your class spells
Talk to Sheldras Moontree and train your class spells
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to Arthur the Faithful and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Joshua and train your class spells
Talk to Einris Brightspear and train your class spells
Talk to Wu or Ilsa and train your class spells. Accept A Troubled Spirit
Talk to Osborne and train your class spells
Go into The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Spackle Thornberry. Buy Grimoires for your pets

tips.text: Buy Grimoires for your pets

steps.description: Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon. Buy Imperfect Draenethyst Fragment and Flawless Draenethyst Sphere for a faster turn in at Blasted Lands shortly

tips.text: This will save you time as you won't need to run around looking for mobs to kill. Skip this step if you wish to not buy any
The Imperfect Draenethyst Fragment and Flawless Draenethyst Sphere are rare and may not be on the Auction House

steps.description: Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Blasted Lands
